name: Like a Bull in a China Shop
name_original: Like a Bull in a China Shop
description:
"Like a Bull in a China Shop" is a simple level concept built for the Design Jam's theme: "Collection".

Control a bull using the WASD or arrow keys on your keyboard.

Search for the Holy Bull Grail, with precision and patience, or with complete chaos in mind.

(In a full version - Challenging levels that send your bull to the start, scores and high-scores to share with friends, upbeat music to crash to your hearts content and many more features would be added ... as well as many more fine china and destruction!)
